room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: My family had such an amazing time. It was our first experience. Erika was our game master and she was very helpful with the explanation and made our experience more exciting. Must try the Prison Break room! Only 23% was able to escape and we are now one of them!! We are totally hooked. Can't wait to come back here again! Thank you!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: My family and I had an amazing time. Erica and the other staff members did a wonderful job with explaining all the rules and they mad us feel right at home. The prison room was challenging but definitely a lot of fun. I'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Our group had a great time breaking out of prison. Can't wait for the new room to open and to come back. The staff was great and the game was so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: I had a great time. I went in knowing nothing about this this type of place. It was me and 9 other very competent people and we did not escape. We did however get to the last possible step on the interrogation room and didn't figure out the last bit of the puzzle and were furious when we found the solution. Highly recommend. I give props to the idea

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Had my daughter's Sweet 16 here (followed by dinner at nearby Piccolo Bussolo). It was a blast! Erica, our Escape host was super accommodating. She let us hide a couple presents in advance, so that the birthday girl could be surprised during the experience. The prison was difficult but very fun. Everyone had a great time & the staff was friendly, helpful. Can't wait to go back and escape again. Thank you
